options.label: B

questions.correct_answer: C. Oral Acyclovir has great benefits in stromal keratitis in patients on topical steroids and topical antivirals

questions.text: All of the statements are true for pterygium except?

options.label: B

questions.text: Which is not seen in vernal kerato conjunctivitis?

questions.text: After copious irrigation of the conjunctival fornices, the next most important step in the initial management of a patient with a chemical eye injury is:

questions.text: A 65 year old patient presents to clinic after seeing a round cobweb like opacity in front of one eye with occasional flashes of light. From this history, what is the approach of the doctor from among the following?

options.label: B
options.text: Screen the retina for any tears

options.label: C
options.text: Reassure and ask her to report if there is increase in floaters

questions.correct_answer: B. Screen the retina for any tears
